archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0922
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I am able to flex the payment terms so that the debtor is not reflected as aged if the payment terms are longer in the debtor aged trial balances.

properties.value: Could you clarify if the question is related to the change of due date? When this change should be possible? DX response: Customer payment terms may be different from customer to customer. Our aged trial balance report should not have aging based on a set expected payment term of 30 days, but based on the due dates. Customized due date on customer account.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
